name: calendar-links-generator-for-events
description: Create an event and get links to add it to your favorite calendar (Google, Outlook, Microsoft365, Yahoo) as well as an .ics file (for calendars like apple's).

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run clean" "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"

author: Ignacio Guzman
